argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gxneg.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | gxneg.2 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gxneg.3 | |- P = ( ^g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_1z | |- 1 e. ZZ |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_gxneg | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ 1 e. ZZ ) -> ( A P -u 1 ) = ( N ` ( A P 1 ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mp3an3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A P -u 1 ) = ( N ` ( A P 1 ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_gx1 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A P 1 ) = A ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A P 1 ) ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A P -u 1 ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
